name: NMDC
description:
NOMADIC (NMDC) is a companion app to your traditional pen-and-paper gameplay and is compatible with most RPGs. Best of all, anyone can play for free. No RPG experience required.

​Unlike other platforms out there, we don’t turn your tabletop into a top-down, 2D video game. We transform your game into an interactive, 3D board so you get all the nostalgia of traditional tabletop play, plus the ease of instant connectivity.

As a DM, you can build your campaign in-game and invite your friends to join within minutes. Or try some of our pre-built quests. With monthly releases of new campaigns, armor, maps, and more, there are countless adventures and customizable features to choose from so game night never gets stale.me night never gets stale.

YOUR TABLE TOP,YOUR RULES.
Your token, character sheets, and maps are endlessly customizable so you can adapt games to fit your quests, or create your own rules from scratch.

CONNECT FELLOW NERDS & ARTISTS
Our discord community makes it easy to find open games, party-less DMs, and new companions to join your quest. You can even play face to (virtual) face with our in-built video chat.

INTERGRATIONS WITH OTHER GAME-MASTERING TOOLS
We’ve got some exciting integrations in the works so stay tuned for further developments! If you want to stay on top of the latest news, you can also sign up for our newsletter.

HIT THE PAUSE BUTTON
Dive right into your campaign, and hit pause when it’s time to restock on snacks or tap out for the night. Your tabletop will boot up right where you left off.

SPEND LESS TIME BUILDINGMAPS & MORE TIME MAKING FRIENDS
As a DM, you know building maps can feel more like work than play. But what if you could kick off customized campaigns in minutes? We designed NMDC to lighten your workload because playing god for a party of adventurers should be fun (not a second job).
